properties.name: path
properties.description: Specifies the URL of an image.This attribute is useful only for images.

properties.name: icon-class
properties.description: Material icon class name.Material Example:icon-class='material-icons' mdb='cloud' Fontawesome Example:icon-class='fa fa-address-book fa-lg'

properties.name: mdb
properties.description: This attribute is useful for only material icons.Material Example:mdb='cloud'
